name: Avalanche Screamer
movement: burrow 20 ft., walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft.
description: The Avalanche Screamer is a large aberration with significant physical strength and the ability to manipulate terrain. It has a chaotic evil appearance combining characteristics suited for ambushing in snowy environments.
memorable: Its thunderous scream can significantly damage and deafen foes, creating a chaotic battlefield environment.
goals: To ambush and overwhelm foes with its powerful bite and thunderous abilities.
relations: It may serve other chaotic creatures or entities linked to the cold or storms.
environment: Typically found in snowy or mountainous regions.
strengths: High physical strength and hit points, coupled with the ability to cause thunder damage and manipulate battle maneuvers.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma hinder strategic planning and social interactions, and its limited Dexterity affects agility.
attacks: Can make a multiattack with one powerful bite and two leg strikes that can immobilize prey.
most_powerful_ability: Its Scream ability unleashes a devastating thunderous shout that can damage and deafen multiple targets.
senses: The creature has tremorsense with a range of 60 feet, enabling it to detect creatures through vibrations.
skills: Excels in athletics and has proficiency in stealth, particularly in snowy environments due to its Snow Camouflage ability.
additional_information: Resistant to cold damage and immune to frightened and prone conditions.
Can impale and restrain targets with its legs if it scores a critical hit.
Utilizes Snow Camouflage for enhanced stealth in snowy terrain.
Can grapple multiple creatures while being immobile.
Moderate speed limits its maneuverability despite its combat prowess.
